vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A woman living at the time of the Patriarchs, only mentioned at Gen.11.29;
daughter of: Haran (H2039);
sister of: Lot (H3876) and Milcah (H4435)
§ Iscah = "one who looks forth"
daughter of Haran, niece of Abraham, sister of Lot and Milcah
vocabInfos._es_Definition: hija de Harán; hermana de Milcá
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
亦迦 这个陰性專有名詞在原文的意思是 "向前看的人"
哈蘭的女兒, 亞伯拉罕的姪女, 羅得和密迦的姊妹 (創 11:29)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
亦迦 这个阴性专有名词在原文的意思是 "向前看的人"
哈兰的女儿, 亚伯拉罕的侄女, 罗得和密迦的姊妹 (创 11:29)
